message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it!
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. Can we meet in the middle?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my initial offer, but I need to make a profit.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can we try $70?
I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. How about we meet at $90? It's a bit higher than your last offer, but I think it's still a good deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm really trying to stick to my budget. Can we meet at $80?
